StreetWorkApp MainActivity SecondActivity 949532445294-2cvshtbsgubvrn54cg9301rrs2pe8dth.apps.googleusercontent.com
// Friend removal : Remove friend Removed %1$s from your friends Error - could not remove friend
// Friend removal dialog Are you sure ? Do you really want to remove %1$s from your friends ?
// Dialogs Cancel Canceled
Confirm Confirmed
Submit Submit
// Helping dialogs(INFO) // Default Info Screen not supported yet Information about this screen is not available. Please explore to learn more! // Map Info How does the map work ? This is the map, here you can see each park that is near you. 

 You can navigate to see more. Click on a park to see its details, such as their events ! // Profile Info What is the Profile ? This is your profile page, you can see your friends and your score. 

 You can also add friends using the "'Add friend' button and you can also access your settings by clicking the gear icon on the top right. // AddFriend Info How do friends work ? This is where you can add a friend.

To add, you need to have a friend nearby and activate bluetooth and location services.

Once you are friends you will be able to do workouts with each other.

Have fun together ! // ParkOverview Info How does parks work ? This is the park overview page, here you can see the park details and the events that are happening there.

You can create an event or join an already existing one. You can also rate the park ! // AddEventInfo How to create an event ? This is your firsts steps towards creating an event ! 

 You simply have to add a cool title, then, describe your event : What are you going to do there ? 

 Finally, set the date and time and you are good to go ! // EventOverview Info What is the Event Overview ? This is the event overview, here you can access all of the information that you need. 

 You are free to join the event if you want to participate ! // Progression Info What is the Progression ? This is the progression screen, here you can see your progression and achievements. 

 There is your record for each exercise in Training, click on it to see more details !
// Progression UI You do not have any achievements yet!
